item.title: 1005 MRO
item.description: score:1005 Chances: Marathon Oil reported second quarter 2023 net income of $287 million or $0.47 per diluted share, and adjusted net income was $295 million or $0.48 per diluted share. The company delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended June 2023, indicating positive financial performance.
